title: The Earthlings
description: ABANDONED BY THEIR GODS! FORSAKEN BY THEIR OVERSEERS!Discover a world where humanity has been bioengineered by alien gods into a diverse array of new races, ranging from the minuscule to the colossal, in The Earthlings!When the alien overseers vanished one fateful morning, the humans were left to confront a daunting new reality. Experience a thrilling adventure in this gripping illustrated novelette by Mike Dubisch.
author: Mike Dubisch
